sentences.sentence: Unlike Mr. Clinton, Mr. Obama is not much of a schmoozer, and some Republicans say he might benefit from becoming more of one.
sentences.translation: 不像克林顿，奥巴马不是笨人，一些共和党人说他可能获利。

sentences.sentence: My clever old aunt is a great schmoozer who always becomes friends with the most influential people at any business event she attends.
sentences.translation: 我聪明的老姨妈能说会道，总能在出席商业活动时和最有影响的人交上朋友。
